mit-accepted.title: Madison west gets accepted into the MIT invitational
mit-accepted.content:
Madison west gets accepted into the MIT invitational after kevin camps the sign-up spreadsheet. Such a great occasion. ![THE MIT building. The one you think about when you hear MIT](../media/blog/mit.jpg)
Where we are going on January 20th.

nats-accepted.title: West science olympiad gets the bid for Nationals!
nats-accepted.content:
On 4/26/24 it was announced that Idaho had declined their national bid and that Madison West would be heading to the 2024 
Science Olympiad national tournament at Michigan State University.

## The team
### A team
1. Angelva Liang
2. Anna Siebers
3. Bobby Henkelmann
4. Caleb Ellenberg
5. Chase Xia
6. Chloe Hu-Pesh
7. Clare Hu-Pesh
8. Ian O'Callaghan
9. Issac Hessman
10. Jahn Fenske
11. Jayden Chiu
12. Jiyoon Chang
13. Robert Igic
14. Yishai Blum
15. Zijun He

4. Noah Duncan

6. Vasu Sahai
